scenes.description: End credits sequence featuring character quotes, scrolling staff credits over various performance backgrounds, and a final handwritten message from Hakos Baelz.

subtitles.original: "You can't be mad at me... I'm cute."
subtitles.english: "You can't be mad at me... I'm cute."
